
  .. _RO_0002582:
  .. _is a defining property chain axiom where second argument is reflexive:
  .. index:: 
     single: RO_0002582; is a defining property chain axiom where second argument is reflexive
     single: is a defining property chain axiom where second argument is reflexive; RO_0002582

RO_0002582 - is a defining property chain axiom where second argument is reflexive
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Alternate name for is a defining property chain axiom where second argument is reflexive

    None


.. topic:: Definition

    If R <- P o Q is a defining property chain axiom, then (1) R -> P o Q holds and (2) Q is either reflexive or locally reflexive. A corollary of this is that P SubPropertyOf R.


.. topic:: Definition Source

    None


.. topic:: Example

    None


.. topic:: Editor's Note

    None


.. topic:: Term Editor

    None
